website_summaries.verdict: Polk Audio's Striker Zx Xbox One Gaming Headset is functional and light, but feels a bit overpriced and underpowered.
pros: Works with most game consoles, handhelds, and mobile devices
cons: Sounds underpowered when used with most gaming devices

customer_reviews.title: Solid value from a well known audio company
customer_reviews.text: Decent. I like the from factor,and the retracting mic is nice. Sound is detailed, with crisp high end. I am not a fan of the huge overblown low end most people seem to want in their headphones, but these are a tad thin for my tastes. My only other complaint is that the earpads get a little uncomfortable after long use. However, for what I paid for them, they are better than a comparably priced set of Microsoft or Turtle Beach phones.
customer_reviews.author: Burnside Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great headset even with its short comings.
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Christmas present for myself. There are pros and cons. Pros: Excellent sound quality. No batteries needed. Comes with chat wire. No xbox one adapter needed. You can hear yourself in chat. Cons: Very tight fit around ears..pain after one hour of use. Short boom mike. Short chat wire. Sound cuts out sometimes. This headset is extremely cool for the price. I will never purchase another set for more than 200 bucks again.
customer_reviews.author: Aging Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Good price! Comfortable for long gaming sessions Cord is nice and long The mic extension is effective and everyone I've played with say that I sound clear Only Con is that the sound quality is not incredible, it's certainly not bad but it's exactly what I expected at this price point! Don't forget the old "you get what you pay for". I've had three sets of Turtle Beach and they've all conked out on me so I'm not falling for their gimmick anymore. This Polk heaset is in my opinion the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Potter

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Purchased used through Amazon Warehouse deals. Product came in with all the accessories and works fine. When installed for initial use the headset did power up and was able to hear game and self through headset. Overall the sound is decent and it does the job in transmitting the sound from counsel to headset. I have nothing to compare to and I am not a professional headset reviewer. Added bonus-you are able to control volume with the included adapter and hide the mic when not in use. Unfortunately one of them had a run in with the family K9 and lost it's line.
customer_reviews.author: jazznlyric

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: I had fairly high hopes for this headset being from Polk Audio. The sound is good but it is not quite what I was expecting, they are not much better than my Sony on-ear headphones that I paid $11.00 on clearance at Target for. The fit of the angled ear cans took a little getting used to but not a deal breaker. Overall I like the headset but with a Xbox Headset adapter they're not really necessary. Do yourself a favor and buy a headset adapter for $20 then us your favorite headphones/earbuds instead. If you don't have headphones with a mic or an xbox headset adapter then these would be a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: DMAC

customer_reviews.title: Decent Headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These work with Xbox One as it comes with its own Volume control you plug into the controller. You can also use these on other devices (same as regular headphones) They're comfortable for longer use You can hear yourself talk through the headset The sound isn't the greatest but it is by no means bad, your average person wouldn't be able to tell the difference anyway. For the money theses are good buy
customer_reviews.author: Alcapwnd

customer_reviews.title: The audio is super muffled compared to other headsets this price
customer_reviews.text: The audio is super muffled compared to other headsets this price. The audio jack has terrible wiring and has broken TWICE. The headset overall is cheaply made junk with low quality plastic parts. My right side ear pad completely snapped off when putting the headset on normally. Ive contacted customer support over this as this is my second headset by polk to break (the first time i assumed it was my fault and bought another) and they've completely ignored my email. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great for the price point. Highs are reasonably crisp, mids aren't horribly muddied as one would expect with inexpensive cans but the low end could use a boost. The USB headset controller that clips onto the game controller is a nice setup compared to the Xbox One head sets with the volume and mic mute on the cord. It allows you to mute your mic or adjust the volume on both the cans and mic.
customer_reviews.author: Phil McKracken

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.  Great sound, Great Microphone
customer_reviews.text: Look good, sound great, excellent mic as well. I upgraded from a Turtle Beach set (Always loved Turtle Beach) because my friends complained about the mic being too low no matter what I did to adjust it. This mic is excellent and the sound quality from the headset is improved over the Turtle Beach as well. These are much more comfortable than my Turtle Beach as well. I sit for a 2-4 hour game session a couple of times a week and these dont bother me at all like previous headsets did.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really love it! I think that it's a great product, lightweight, clear and powerful sound, the isolation it's insane you absolutely can't here anything thats happening in the world besides your gaming experience! I have been playing for a while with these now (different games) but recently I played Star Wars Battlefront with them and the sound of it it's just out of this galaxy (see what I did back there?)Now imagine the blasts of Stormtroopers, Tie Fighters, Lightsabers or just Vader with an astonishing quality and massive power. +10
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: Great product with really good audio quality. Even though I am somewhat hearing impaired, the headset's audio quality is so good that I have no problems hearing chat and game audio clearly and my friends have no problems hearing me in party chat and there is no feedback to annoy other party members. The only con is that this model has no rechargeable battery built in which causes your controller batteries to be used up much faster than normal due to the audio quality this headset produces.
customer_reviews.author: WajangFuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headset
customer_reviews.text: Fit is nice and sound is decent. Small kids love to mess with the retractable mic, so tell them to be respectful of it. Very good value
customer_reviews.author: "Larry"

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was very good for the product but comfort was a big concern
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was very good for the product but comfort was a big concern. I did not find the ear cups to be comfortable and they were quite small as well. The top padding is not enough and my head did get irritated after only 20 minutes of playing. The microphone did get in the way quite often as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kunal Verma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones to use with the Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones to use with the Xbox One. Highly recommend Polk audio headphones. The earcups are slightly shallow so if you have ears that stick out, you might want to consider getting something different to avoid uncomfortable ears if you wear these for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J.

customer_reviews.title: For 60 bucks ... You can't beat it. Up to par with all turtle beach headsets for a 1/4 of the price. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple headsets.. Turtle beach XO7 and XO7 pro and iv had the stealth 500 and 800... After you update the controller this is most definitely a solid headset for the price.. Iv played destiny .. Battlefront and Doom and this headset is up to par with the turtle beach headsets for a 1/4 of the price ... The mic works great and the sound is amazing. I was skeptical reading some of the reviews but I am 100% satisfied. To me the plastic doesn't feel cheap it's a solid piece of equipment and personally I like the retractable mic. I would highly recommend. For 60 bucks you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset! Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset! I love the design and it seems pretty well built. The sound is great, and has high bass that really gives a full immersion, similar to surround sound. The retractable mic at first, seemed a little short, but it is plenty sensitive, so there should be no problem. The padding on the ears is great, and the padding on the headband is good, but it would be nicer if it was more firm. Works great with my phone also, and sounds just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Burrell

customer_reviews.title: The sound is incredible for the price and I really ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible for the price and I really find it convenient to be able to completely retract the mic boom. However, after about 2 to 3 hours of use, I experienced pain on my ears from the tightness of the muffs. I have a medium sized head and the muffs were still not deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality doesn't matter if the cables break...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great but we are 0 for 2 in the quality department. Bought 2 for our boys and both pairs broke inside of 2 weeks. On one pair the plug broke and on the other the cable broke where it enters the plug. Do note that the cable is rubbery, thin, and not replaceable. We are sending both paid back to Amazon for a refund and will try another option. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Anne G. Sehm

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Everything has been great with this headset, works perfectly and is comfortable, good sound. I go 4 rather than 5 because the plug doesn't feen as sturdy as the rest of it and I am always a little worried of how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Reed J Millar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I play with these all the time with my XBox one and they are awesome! The sound is amazing quality and it makes me feel like I'm in the game! The only "problem" I have is that I can't hear my wife and kids when they are talking to me, but thats really more their problem then mine with them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great. Lasted 5 months, but Polk replaced them fast
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great sound. I was very happy. Now they are broken. The jack is poorly protected and a wire has come loose. If you get these, treat them very gently. They are weak. I would have given these a 5 but 5 months is an unacceptably short life span. Good thing Polk replaced them without any fuss.
customer_reviews.author: blorptalk

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Crisp sound quality and unique adjustable mic that was a bit too short but the Xbox One adapter that was also designed by Polk Audio is better than the standard Xbox adapter because you can switch from the game chat to the party chat (and vice versa) in a click of the button. You can't adjust the headband so it is one size. The earcuffs were comfortable and well cushioned. Also can't soundwh0re as well in Call of Duty.
customer_reviews.author: Minh

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Very clear game sound and very clean chat. I had the Polk 4shot which had all the chat/mic issues and decided to try out the replacement. They've seemed to fix any issues that headset had. Just wish the game volume was a little louder but it's loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: be careful the cord gets damaged if you hold your contoler up aganst your belly alot. the cord just sticks out insead of coming out at a right angle. that being said i do enjoy the headset alot. also when my cord broke i called them and they sent out a repalcement quickly and took care of me very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, and very comfortable, however, after a few months, the sound coming out of the right earpiece stopped working, then the mic stopped working. I was optimistic about this product, but can't recommend it after such a short lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Going against my better judgement, I decided to order these despite reading all the negative reviews. Well after 5 months of use, the "up" volume button stopped working, followed by complete microphone and audio failure a month later. Do yourself a favor and look at another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you have small ears, which I don't, the cushion will sit right on top of your ears which feels weird at first but its something I got used to and now doesn't really bother me. I bought it to use with my Xbox one and everything sounds beautiful. Great headset, not perfect but pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Cliserio Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Just like most headphones out there
customer_reviews.text: These headphones don't really have may redeeming qualities. They're cheap, plasticy and blah. Just like most headphones out there. So 3 stars because they're like everything else.
customer_reviews.author: jackie egger

customer_reviews.title: This was my son's second pair. They both broke ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's second pair. They both broke within a month. They cracked in the same area on the head phones.
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: For the current price of $40, you can't beat ...
customer_reviews.text: For the current price of $40, you can't beat this item. At full price, I probs would have bought the Turtle Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fox

customer_reviews.title: This head set was very good to me while I owned it
customer_reviews.text: This head set was very good to me while I owned it. Very good sound output, and very clear audio input.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Morris

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, comfortable, and for those who say the mic is too short: I have had no issues at all, the mic is very sensitive and responsive. Almost too sensitive since it picks up controller clicks and what not
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: It appears the sounds comes in and out as I ...
customer_reviews.text: It appears the sounds comes in and out as I play a game or watch a movie. I have to play with the wires to get the signal back.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Marchante

customer_reviews.title: Lacking customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, worked well at first. Then, it started to have sounds problems. Contacted company for return and replacement. We haven't heard from them.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Cool

customer_reviews.title: These are great! The bass could be a little more powerful ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The bass could be a little more powerful but other than that it's exactly what I was hoping for in a headset. Simple, ergonomic and functions just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Never had turtle beach but these sound great. Cable lengh great for me. Mic feedback and storage also good. 1 hr use and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel H.

customer_reviews.title: ... I put these on my head they are way better than my previous headset I'm able to hear everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Once I put these on my head they are way better than my previous headset I'm able to hear everything crystal clear I'm able to hear my friends crystal clear I'm also able to hear the game crystal clear all know is it pretty decent headset
customer_reviews.author: johnathan radice

customer_reviews.title: microphone is not very good. Overall quality just wasn't what I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: microphone is not very good. Overall quality just wasn't what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.author: Agreysing

customer_reviews.title: Good until wire failure.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, nice and light... But a few weeks in, the cord has failed, connection at the plug gone bad. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: crAsh

customer_reviews.title: Great...No AMAZING Sound, Bad Durability
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound quality of this headset, but the right eat phone had completely snapped off. I was using this for Gaming, Music and all around audio usage. Now the experience is tainted with a snapped off right earphone.
customer_reviews.author: nathan grant

customer_reviews.title: Microphone no longer works.  Purchased 3 months ago.
customer_reviews.text: Horrific. Microphone no longer works and headset is cracked. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok
customer_reviews.text: This sound pretty good but dosnt get very loud. They also smoosh my ears. Very tight all the way around the head. Mic sounds nice as dose chat
customer_reviews.author: D9Oll)ll

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio striker Zx
customer_reviews.text: works as expected good price and in stock better than Bestbuy
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Headset works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I love this headset compared to the other vendor headset I purchased for my 360.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Left side quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Left side ear piece quit working after only two and a half months of using them. Trying to find out what the warranty is.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: best headset ever. you can change the sound of chat or game sounds whichever one youd like to hear louder, the only thing i would like better is if they were a little louder. also package came in pristine box, and very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: kyle oneil

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last - Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these headphones. Got these as a Xmas gift for my son who is an avid gammer. At first the sound quality and comfort of the headphones were fantastic, however, after 15 or so days the sound started to go out in one of the ears. It required you to jiggle the cord around to get them to work properly. Contacted Amazon and they quickly sent us a new pair. Unfortunately 21 days later the same thing happen to the new pair. I would NOT recommend going with these headphones if you intent to use them allot. They don't seem to be built to handle regular day to day usage.
customer_reviews.author: CTOESITE

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Polk, but the construction on these are week. Snapped after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: they are extremely comfortable, and they sound incredible
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, they are extremely comfortable, and they sound incredible. I have been using TurtleBeach for the last 5+ years and am glad that i made the switch to Polk.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gale III

customer_reviews.title: Just get Turtle Beach
customer_reviews.text: Seriously theyre better. The only upside to the Polks is that the mic is retractable but the mic isnt long enough so sit properly so its kind of a moot point.
customer_reviews.author: Kalder

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, budget price
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Good price and impressive sound. Are they Bose? No. But they were about a quarter of the price. So, I love 'em. Plenty good for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sub par
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a internally shorted cable. Most likely from previous user.
customer_reviews.author: Premium member

customer_reviews.title: Was barely used and stopped working. Wiring sounds as ...
customer_reviews.text: Was barely used and stopped working. Wiring sounds as though it is loose and I'm told when I use the mic, it is nothing but static.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smith

customer_reviews.title: All around great!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome you can even tell which direction sounds are coming from on a game. I did a lot of research before choosing the polks and I'm very pleased with there performance especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: Durability isnt great
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. The wure duravility isnt the greatest. Ive had the put electrical tape over parts to stop a crackling sound.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great pair for my Xbox one. Always clear and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Both the audio and mic are excellent. Since the mic is retractable these double as over-ear headphones, so music listening is more than enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Miller

customer_reviews.title: The mic isn't that great its hard for people to hear you in game
customer_reviews.text: The mic isn't that great its hard for people to hear you in game. And they broke on me 3 months after i got them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: get one
customer_reviews.text: For 60 bucks plus the attachment thingy that is 25$ separately and u can hear ure own voice, pretty cool. Sounds good, seems pretty sturdy! Not wireless
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Something so new shouldn't break so easily. Took care of it like anyone else would ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this headset for 6 months the left ear-piece broke off. Something so new shouldn't break so easily. Took care of it like anyone else would have. Shouldn't happen to a new item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product does all you expect and great sound clarity
customer_reviews.author: Peter Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last me two Months and they already broke
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty cool headset
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool headset. It sounds amazing. I just have problems with people in party chat hearing me sometimes. Maybe it just takes getting used to. But I'm not a fan of the adapter that comes with it. I just plugged the headset straight into my controller. I would have to use the adapter if I were using the controller that came with my Xbox. I tested it on my phone last night. I listened to music and watched movies on my phone and it worked smoothly. The only thing I didn't try was making a phone call. Right now, I am listening to Spotify on my MacBook Pro with these plugged in and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chief222

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: When I received the item it was assumed that it was new, however the box had been opened and the mic cable was frayed with exposed wire. Without anyway of proving this was not my error I'm now forced to use these with a crackling cable that causes loud pops and audio cut out. There were also scuff marks on the ear cups and a residue that I had to clean off right out of the package. I don't know if these were accepted as a return or if someone didn't check the item before accepting it back into inventory but I am terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value headphones.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these headphones. The sound quality isn't as good as more expensive Turtle Beach's but for the price, it is definitely worth the purchase. They're very lightweight but sturdy. Not sure about the mic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie DeAloe

customer_reviews.title: These headphones would be great if the wire wasnt part of the headset and ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones would be great if the wire wasn't part of the headset and not interchangeable. When the wire goes bad, like mine u are left with remorse, sadness, and doubt. UPDATE: After receiving a replacement headset my new headset developed the same problem as the first a loose wire from the controller to headset makes this product a static mess.
customer_reviews.author: A Weller

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, both mic and headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, both mic and headphones. however the ear-cups are shallow, and are uncomfortable after an hour or so of use. would love to give 4 or even 5 stars, but I switch to other headphones that have lower quality sound just for the comfort, i really cannot stand using them for more than an hour or 2 before it becomes almost unbearable. TLDR: good audio sound, good mic. poor comfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for hours, great sound, good microphone. Affordable gamer kit FTW
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, The over the ear is small for my 17 year kid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not work properly. Hearing chat is spotty and being heard non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: PTindell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but delicate
customer_reviews.text: Product was great with surround sound, wasn't bulky or very noticeable on my head. However, it only lasted three months before there was a short in the audio jack due to an abnormally short cord from the controller to the headset which caused continuous disconnection from the adapter. If you're looking for something cheap with good quality, this is your product but treat it like a new born baby or you'll be tossing in the trash after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amphibiou5

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall good headset. Only gripe is while wearing glasses it can be a little too tight
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a few months then stopped working in one ear
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Polk quality
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and still look and sound great. Good for games and music.
customer_reviews.author: kadeperkins

product_meta.title: Polk Audio Striker Zx Gaming Headset - Black

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
